audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by Industry or Sector :: Education

name: Ashley Park Elementary
short_description: The Ashley Park community in Charlotte, NC has a learning garden that is there for the benefit of the community as well as Ashley Park Elementary. The purpose of this project is to come up with a strategy to find a way to get the community as well as the students aware and engaged in the garden. My hope with this project is to give the students and the community the opportunity to learn about gardening, nutrition, sustainability, and a sense of neighborhood ownership and pride.
